```{r unicodes}


scopus_id<-read_csv("./data_clean/uni_affils_clean.csv") %>% 
  # mutate(uni=case_when(
  #   # uni == "minn"~"other",
  #   uni == "unc_ch"~"other",
  #   uni == "ohio_state"~"other",
  #   is.na(uni) ~ "other",
  #   .default = as.character(uni)
  # )) %>% 
  filter(uni!="other") %>%
  filter(uni!="mass_general") %>%
  # filter(uni=="florida") %>%
  # slice_head(n=30) %>% 
  distinct(affil_id,.keep_all=TRUE) %>% 
  arrange(uni,desc(pub_count)) %>% 
  select(uni,affil_id,affiliation) %>% 
  mutate(affiliation=tolower(affiliation)) %>% 
  mutate(uni=case_when(
    uni == "unc_ch"~"UNC Chapel Hill",
    uni == "ohio_state"~"The Ohio State University",
    uni == "florida"~"University of Florida",
    uni == "harvard"~"Harvard University",
    uni == "mass_general"~"Massachusetts General Hospital",
    uni == "michigan"~"University of Michigan",
    uni == "penn"~"University of Pennsylvania",
    uni == "stanford"~"Stanford University",
    uni == "ucla"~"University of California, Los Angeles",
    uni == "minn"~"University of Minnesota",
    uni == "ucsd"~"University of California, San Diego",
    uni == "ucsf"~"University of California, San Francisco",
    uni == "washington"~"University of Washington",
    .default = as.character(uni)
  )) %>% 
  arrange(uni)
# %>% 
#   mutate(row=row_number())

# scopus_id %>% group_by(uni) %>% tally() %>% mutate(row_start=cumsum(n)-n+1) %>% mutate(row_end=cumsum(n))

first<-scopus_id %>% 
    mutate(first=row_number()) %>% 
  group_by(uni) %>% slice_head(n=1) %>%
select(uni,first)
last<-scopus_id %>% 
  mutate(last=row_number()) %>% 
  group_by(uni) %>% 
  slice_tail(n=1) %>% 
  select(uni,last)
first_last<-left_join(first,last) %>% 
  arrange(uni)
rm(first,last)


  
scopus_id %>% 
    select(`Scopus ID`=affil_id,
         Affiliation=affiliation) %>% 
  mutate(Affiliation=tolower(Affiliation)) %>% 
  kable(
      format    = "latex", 
      longtable = T, 
      booktabs  = T, 
      caption   = "Scopus Affiliation ID codes used in the search of research productivity by ten US research-intensive universities and the affiliations associated with these codes.",
      align = "rl",
      ) %>%
  kable_styling(
    # longtable = T, 
    bootstrap_options = c("hover"),
    full_width = T,
    latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header"),
    repeat_header_continued = "\\textit{(Continued on next page...)}",
    position = "center",
    font_size = 8
  ) %>% 
  row_spec(0, bold = T) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "37em") %>% 
  # column_spec(3, width = "25em") %>% 
  
  pack_rows("HARVARD UNIVERSITY", as.numeric(first_last[1,2]), as.numeric(first_last[1,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  
  pack_rows("STANFORD UNIVERSITY", as.numeric(first_last[2,2]), as.numeric(first_last[2,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  
  pack_rows("THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY", as.numeric(first_last[3,2]), as.numeric(first_last[3,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  
 pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF NORTH CAROLINA, CHAPEL HILL" , as.numeric(first_last[4,2]), as.numeric(first_last[4,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  
  
  pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, LOS ANGELES", as.numeric(first_last[5,2]), as.numeric(first_last[5,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, SAN DIEGO", as.numeric(first_last[6,2]), as.numeric(first_last[6,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, SAN FRANCISCO", as.numeric(first_last[7,2]), as.numeric(first_last[7,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  
  pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA", as.numeric(first_last[8,2]), as.numeric(first_last[8,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  
  pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN, ANN ARBOR", as.numeric(first_last[9,2]), as.numeric(first_last[9,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF MINNESOTA, TWIN CITIES", as.numeric(first_last[10,2]), as.numeric(first_last[10,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA", as.numeric(first_last[11,2]), as.numeric(first_last[11,3]), indent = TRUE) %>% 
  pack_rows("UNIVERSITY OF WASHINGTON", as.numeric(first_last[12,2]), as.numeric(first_last[12,3]), indent = TRUE)
```
